entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Kindersley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -14.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kindersley Airport 8:00 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -14.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -16.1°C
Wind: N 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 7:22 PM CST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 10.
